Class NotificationPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • NotificationPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class NotificationPanel
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    Author:
    Fares Almuhanna General idea: Notification is the way the administrator can send mass email or sms to subscribers Programming idea: By using the database content already created by subscriptionPanel, this program can send mass email or sms for all subscribers based on type of sport
    See Also:

      • actionPerformed

        public void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
        Specified by:
        actionPerformed in interface java.awt.event.ActionListener

      • sendToEmail

        public static void sendToEmail(java.lang.String txtFile,
               java.lang.String subject,
               java.lang.String content)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        SendToEmail method check each line of txt file that has phone-numbers/emails and pass each line to "send" method, with param of subject and contect
        Parameters:
        txtFile - is a string of a file location.
        subject - is the title of the mass message.
        content - is the content of the mass message.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • send

        public static void send(java.lang.String email,
        java.lang.String subject,
        java.lang.String content)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        send method is the sending function used to send all emails and SMS. Send email with SMTPS - JAVA MAIL (GMAIL) Account used to send messages is "BazingaSE@gmail.com" Reference : The concept of this method was taked from-> "http://www.rgagnon.com/javadetails/java-0570.html"
        Parameters:
        email - is the receiver address whether its phone number or email
        subject - is the title of the mass message.
        content - is the content of the mass message.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
